name: slow-healing-long-rest-spell-points
title: Long Rest Hit Die Healing and Spell Points for D&D5e
description: Adds the "Slow Natural Healing" rules to the dnd5e system. Rather than healing to full hit points, actors now have the option to spend hit dice on a long rest. In addition, the character regains only a portion of their spell slots.
author: Wasp (Wasp#2005)
